text.*:
This is a list of flags of Indonesia containing images and information about the official Indonesian flags used, and other historical flags.

Contents

  • 2 Provinces flags
  • 3 Regencies/Cities
  • 4 Historical flags
    • 4.1 Flags of states of United States of Indonesia
    • 4.2 Former province
    • 4.3 Pre-Colonial Countries/Kingdoms
    • 4.4 Others flags
  • 5 Flags of separatism movement
    • 5.1 Rebel movement
  • 6 See also
  • 7 References

National flag[edit]

Main article: Flag of Indonesia
Flag Date Use Description
17 August 1945 – national flags and national ensign A horizontal bicolor of red and white
17 August 1945 – Naval jack of Indonesian Navy Nine equal horizontal alternating stripes of red and white

Provinces flags[edit]

The provincial flags was raised at the opening of the National Paralympic Week event 2016 (XV) in Siliwangi Stadium, Bandung.
